Name: polystyrene foam slab for perimeter insulation | polystyrene foam slab for perimeter insulation | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products
Description: Swiss average EPS production; process from 2 factories in Switzerland. The polystyrene granulate which contains pentane is expanded with steam. In a thermoforming process the expanded granulate is formed into slabs and finally cut to the desired dimensions.
